headline: Chief Marketing Officer
summary: * Driven and experienced marketing leader with expert proficiency in providing unsurpassed leadership and growth in dynamic, fast paced, competitive environments; skilled in establishing and growing strategic partnerships that enable the company to scale for growth         * Skilled in the successful application of innovative marketing strategies that enable sustained growth, expand revenue, elevate brand awareness, and improve customer acquisition.  Builds and leads strong teams of top performers  * Accomplished strategist with a history of leading initiatives that spark significant gains in efficiency, productivity, and operational effectiveness  Areas of Expertise: * Marketing Leadership * P&L Management * Field Marketing Strategy * Strategic Planning/Execution * Marketing and Advertising * Budget Administration
organization_description_3: Leads vision, strategy, and execution for all facets of marketing on a global scale for this global provider of automated testing and assurance solutions for networks, security and positioning.  Continually innovates digital-first marketing strategies and campaigns designed to bolster the visibility of the company and its services in a challenging and highly competitive industry.   • Launched a Digital First Marketing strategy with an integrated approach that yielded initial results of 25% more digital marketing qualified leads. • Established 5 new web assets including a corporate site, 3 international sites (Japanese, Korean and Chinese) and an investor relations site. Initial results indicate over 35% more traffic and 11% increase in conversion rates from corporate site. • Innovated a corporate internal communications program rating well above industry benchmarks for open and CTR. • Launched a social advocacy program including Executive and influencer amplification that improved social engagement over 50%.
organization_description_4: Fulfilled a critical role overseeing marketing for this provider of network performance monitoring solutions, serving as the architect of groundbreaking digital strategies to drive marketing-originated leads, build revenue, and expand market share.  Recruited to build a modern brand identity and clear value proposition to support penetration into US markets.  • Orchestrated and executed a global rebranding initiative and the launch of a integrated marketing strategy. • Excelled across key metrics, increasing social media engagement by more than 200% and press and analyst coverage by more than 300%. • Created and managed a digital marketing strategy featuring SEO/SEM, a blog, content syndication, retargeting, paid/organic search, and paid social elements.  Secured a 25% increase in website traffic. • Launched a partner portal serving over 144 global partners, as well as a customer reference program.
organization_description_5: Assumed a lead role navigating the company’s evolution from a provider of telecommunications software into a marketing leading unified communications vendor, managing 12 direct reports in Europe and North America and a $24M budget.   Established a strong brand identity including new visuals and thought leadership messaging. Made the brand more end-user focused, with a bolder look and feel, coupled with simplified messaging.  Responsible for managing global communications relating to M&A transactions.  • Outstanding results, supporting over 25% YOY revenue growth to reach over $300M in 2016, anchored by marketing tactics involving branding, events, public relations, social media, digital assets and internal communications. • Handled the logistics and content development for the company’s annual Connections user conference, which attracted over 1300 attendees from around the world and received the highest approval rating out of all user conferences. •  Formed the Digital Marketing Group and expanded the company’s online presence, improving social media statistics by 25%. • Managed internal and external messaging, social media, and public relations associated with five acquisitions during 2015 to 2016. • From 2014 to 2015, achieved a greater than 100% increase in public relations coverage.
organization_title_6: Director of Marketing and Sales Enablement
organization_description_6: A demonstrated record of success and achievement at this unified communications company, marked by a promotion to a position of increased influence, authority, and accountability.  Valued for doing more with less, leading a small team supporting a significant business vertical.  Developed a field marketing strategy encompassing events, inbound and outbound initiatives, and content marketing.  2009 to 2015: Director of Marketing and Sales Enablement Promoted to oversee all aspects of marketing, including public relations, advertising, trade shows and events, website management, and market/competitor research, supporting over $510M in annual revenue for the Government Solutions division.  Directed the Marketing Department and all support staff. • Coordinated and led the rebranding initiative to Avaya Federal following the acquisition of Nortel Government Solutions, building sales enablement and marketing collateral for the product and services teams. • Established a central online repository of industry-specific marketing collateral, case studies, and other tools. • Innovated multi-channel partner marketing campaigns integrating email, direct mail and website direct response with emerging go-to-market tactics for both direct and indirect sales channels.  2000 to 2009: Senior Marketing Manager Formulated marketing strategies to support over $190M in revenue from Federal Sector accounts.  Developed and delivered marketing solutions spanning Advertising, Public Relations, Event Management, Solutions Marketing, Web Presence and Government Affairs. • Introduced 48 regional and global electronic newsletters in 10 languages, securing an average open rate of 35%.
organization_description_7: •	Led all marketing activities for Federal Sector to support results of over $190 M. This included driving and managing all deliverables with Advertising, Public Relations, Event Management, Solutions Marketing, Web Presence and Government Affairs to increase revenue and build relationships within this extremely strategic segment  •	Managed all marketing activities for the Tri-State Regions with focus on State and Local accounts (NJ, PA, DE) including national and local events, enrollment in corporate marketing campaigns and PR/Customer Reference Programs •	Launched and managed a total of 48 Global eNewsletters (in 10 different languages)
